q: The online version of its Dynamics CRM Software will be now available in 40 countries and in 41 languages at a promotional offer of$ 34 per user per month for 12 months. Steve Ballmer said: This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version, and I think that really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud. There is no debate, there are no dissenting voices. An endless stream of pro-Gbagbo supporters parades in front of the TV cameras.
